name: Emissary Sigil
description: Display the mark of Arlo’s devoted with this Sigil.

languages.description: Zeigt das Zeichen von Arlos Anhängern mit diesem Siegel.
languages.name: Siegel: Botschafter

languages.description: Portez la marque des disciples d'Arlo avec ce Sceau.
languages.name: Sceau Émissaire

languages.description: Mostra il marchio dei devoti di Arlo con questo Sigillo.
languages.name: Sigillo Emissary

languages.description: 이 시질로 알로의 추종자 문양을 표시하세요.
languages.name: 에미서리 시질

languages.description: Muestra la marca de los devotos de Arlo con este sello.
languages.name: Sello Emisario

languages.description: 用这个纹章来展现 Arlo 的信徒标记。
languages.name: 使徒纹章

languages.description: Покажите знак адепта Арло, нося этот сигил.
languages.name: Сигил: Эмиссар

languages.description: Arloの献身的な信徒である印をこのシジルで示そう。
languages.name: Emissary シジル

languages.description: Noś ten Znak, by okazać wierność Arlo.
languages.name: Znak Emisariusza

languages.description: Exiba o símbolo dos devotos de Arlo com este Brasão.
languages.name: Brasão: Emissário

languages.description: 用這個紋章來展現 Arlo 的信徒標記。
languages.name: 使徒紋章

languages.description: แสดงเครื่องหมายแห่งการอุทิศตนของ Arlo ด้วยเครื่องหมายนี้
languages.name: เครื่องหมาย: Emissary

languages.description: Bu Mühür ile Arlo'nun sadakatinin işaretini gösterin.
languages.name: Temsilci Mührü
